item.title: Boilerplate For Angular 1.X and Django(Powered by Webpack2, Docker, Yarn, DRF)
item.description: This post is deprecated. Use it at your own risk Simple and clean boilerplate for using django and angular 1.x togather, with basic structure comes built-in. Table of contents  Tech Stack Prerequisite Setup frontend Setup docker Setup backend Usage Local settings sample Screenshots Tech Stack Python3 Django 1.
